data.title: Recruiting with Sgt. Julia Curren
data.meta_description:
Sgt. Julia Curren, a recruiter with the Recruiting and Retention Battalion, discusses her experience enlisting into the Rhode Island National Guard and becoming a Soldier. As a full-time recruiter, she assists other women enlisting in the military.

(U.S. Army National Guard video by Staff Sgt. Terry Rajsombath)
data.text:
Sgt. Julia Curren, a recruiter with the Recruiting and Retention Battalion, discusses her experience enlisting into the Rhode Island National Guard and becoming a Soldier. As a full-time recruiter, she assists other women enlisting in the military.

(U.S. Army National Guard video by Staff Sgt. Terry Rajsombath)
